svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: (C) Validation: In Silico Mutagenesis vs Allelic Imbalance

switch.text: (C) Validation: In Silico Mutagenesis vs Allelic Imbalance

div.div:
✓ Observed allelic imbalance matches predicted direction
(G more accessible than A, confirming model prediction)

switch.text: ✓ Observed allelic imbalance matches predicted direction...

div.div:
• Variants with high predicted effect show significant allelic imbalance (p < 0.01)
• Predicted direction matches observed direction for majority of validated variants
• Effect not seen for random variants without predicted regulatory impact

switch.text: • Variants with high predicted effect show significant allelic imbalance (p < 0.01)...
